name: RI_1_1_20_1_Evidence_of_Record_Entry_Unmerge_Event
title: RI.1.1.20.1 Evidence of Record Entry Unmerge Event (Function)
description: Maintain Evidence of Record Entry Unmerge Event
purpose: Evidence of Record Entry Unmerge Event includes key metadata, ensures health record integrity (and trust) and enables record audit.

statement.label: RI.1.1.20.1#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL audit each occurrence when merged Record Entries are unmerged.

statement.label: RI.1.1.20.1#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the organization where Record Entries are unmerged.

statement.label: RI.1.1.20.1#03
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the patient who is subject of unmerged Record Entries.

statement.label: RI.1.1.20.1#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the identifier for the source set of Record Entries.

statement.label: RI.1.1.20.1#05
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the identifier for the target set of Record Entries.

statement.label: RI.1.1.20.1#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the user unmerging Record Entries.

statement.label: RI.1.1.20.1#07
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the system application which unmerged Record Entries.

statement.label: RI.1.1.20.1#08
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the type of Record Event trigger (i.e., unmerge).

statement.label: RI.1.1.20.1#09
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the date and time Record Entries are unmerged.

statement.label: RI.1.1.20.1#10
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture identity of the location (i.e., network address) where Record Entries are unmerged.

statement.label: RI.1.1.20.1#11
statement.requirement: The system MAY capture the rationale for unmerging Record Entries.

statement.label: RI.1.1.20.1#12
statement.requirement: The system MAY capture the data, document or other identifier for unmerged Record Entries.
